comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: In 1913 he became Premier of Spain for the first time (October 27, 1913.)

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Wystan and Richard Arthur Norton, 

Thanks for the information on Eduardo Dato e Iradier!  We will add his full name as well as spell out Spanish in the title.

As regular travelers in the Bain Collection in Flickr, it may interest you to know we processed the collection with caption information from two main sources: caption cards and the negatives themselves. (As noted in the Notes area in the record.) The records were primarily created from the caption cards, and sometimes later amended with information from the negatives (or negative sleeves). 

This is why you will often see differences between the information recorded in the title area and the information on the image itself.  

Thanks for your input!
